discussion_comments.comment_body: Since the SAML plugin isn't often installed, I thought it's best to ensure we only show the tab here when it is installed. This relies on making this setting visible to the client in the SAML plugin. See https://github.com/discourse/discourse-saml/pull/130

Would it make sense to use `this.currentUser?.user_option?.timezone || moment.tz.guess()` here? Generally speaking, the user's set timezone in their profile is correct and we rely on it in other places (bookmarks, status).
